entities.name: argus filch
entities.description: The caretaker of Hogwarts who is strict and has a cat named Mrs Norris. He was described as being worse than Peeves.

entities.name: peeves
entities.description: A poltergeist that was mentioned to be worse than Argus Filch.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: One of the main characters who got on the wrong side of Argus Filch on their first morning.

entities.name: ron weasley
entities.description: Harry's friend who also got on the wrong side of Argus Filch.

entities.name: professor quirrell
entities.description: A professor who rescued Harry and Ron from being locked in the dungeons by Argus Filch.

entities.name: weasley twins
entities.description: The twin brothers of Ron Weasley who are known to be clever and have secret passageways knowledge.

entities.name: mrs norris
entities.description: Argus Filch's cat that patrols the corridors and reports any rule breakers to Filch.

relationships.description: Peeves was described as being worse than Argus Filch.
Harry and Ron got on the wrong side of Argus Filch on their first morning.
Harry and Ron got on the wrong side of Argus Filch on their first morning.
Professor Quirrell rescued Harry from being locked in the dungeons by Argus Filch.
Argus Filch owned a cat called Mrs Norris.
The Weasley twins knew the secret passageways of Hogwarts better than anyone except Argus Filch.
